entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who wonders who will be teaching them. She is described as part of a group that is 'edged into the chattering crowd'.

entities.name: flitwick
entities.description: Flitwick is mentioned as someone who might be teaching them. He is described as a duelling champion when he was young.

relationships.description: Hermione speculates that Flitwick might be the one teaching them, based on a rumor she heard.
